show_wip.title: Show WIP PRs
show_wip.description: If true, WIP PRs will be included in the output, else they are ignored.

filter_labels.title: Filter Labels
filter_labels.description: If any PR or issue has any label that matches any of these labels, they are excluded.

stale_label.title: Stale Label
stale_label.description: A label to identify stale PRs/issues. If set, stale PRs and issues will be listed separately and split into newly and other stale items.

do_open_prs.title: Do open PRs
do_open_prs.description: Show a list of open PRs.

do_merged_prs.title: Do merged PRs
do_merged_prs.description: Show a list of merged PRs.

do_recent_issues.title: Do recent issues
do_recent_issues.description: Show a list of issues opened in the time interval.

no_assignee_attention.title: No Assignee Attention
no_assignee_attention.description: Draw attention to items without an assignee
